title: Coronavirus: Delivery drivers fear lack of protection as they work through pandemic
description: Truckers tell Vincent Wood they are being left to choose between their jobs and their ability to stay safe and clean during the coronavirus outbreak as major companies deny them fundamental working rights
content:
I wouldn't let an animal go to the toilets that we've got to go to, says Rod Brough, a 60-year-old haulier who has been driving for four decades.
